subject: UN
title: Industrial Research Project in Nuclear Engineering
description: An industry-oriented research project in the field of Engineering Risk and Reliability Analysis.  The project will be completed in an industrial laboratory under the supervision of a suitably qualified staff scientist and a university co-supervisor.  The topic for the project will be arranged in consultation with the candidate and through negotiation with the candidate's employer.  A substantial report on the project and a verbal presentation at the University are required.  The industrial research project is equivalent to two half-term courses.
